title: News: Opening the news section for the first time
custom_preconds: Given that this is the first time going to the news section
custom_steps:
When you tap on news in the section picker
Or when you first open the app 
And the news section is the default section
custom_expected: Then the first article in the list on the left should load on the main section to the right

title: News: Tapping on an article
custom_preconds: Given you are in the news section
custom_steps: When you tap on any article in the list on the left
custom_expected:
Then that article will be highlighted dark grey
And that article will load in the main section to the right

title: News: Loading thumbnails for articles
custom_preconds: Given you are on the news section
custom_steps: When you are on the news section
custom_expected:
Then all the articles in the list to the left should have a thumbnail relevant to the article
Or have a default MLB logo

title: News: Scrolling the list of articles
custom_preconds:
Given that you are on the news section
And there are more than 7 articles in the list
custom_steps: When you drag the list of articles on the left upward
custom_expected:
Then the other articles below that could not be seen previously will show
And while some of the thumbnails load the default MLB logo will show in its place

title: News: Playing video in an article
custom_preconds: Given the article has a video to play which you can tell by the thumbnail in the article having a play button
custom_steps: When you tap on the thumbnail in the article
custom_expected: Then the video player will open to the whole screen and begin playing the corresponding video

title: News: Choosing a team news index
custom_preconds: Given you are on the news section
custom_steps:
When you tap on the news index picker (by default it will be on MLB.com Headlines)
And you tap on any of the teams in the drop down
custom_expected:
Then you will be brought to that team's news index
And the first article in that team's new index will load in the main section to the right

title: News: Tapping on the news index picker
custom_preconds: Given you are on on the news section
custom_steps: When you tap on the news index picker
custom_expected:
Then you a drop down menu of all the team news indices as well as the MLB.com Headlines will appear
And all the team logos and names should be accurate

title: News: Coming back to the news section
custom_preconds:
Given that you have visited the news section previously
And you picked an article other than the first one
custom_steps:
When you go to the section picker and choose any section other than the news section
And when you get to the new section go to the section picker and go back to the news section
custom_expected: Then the article you were last on will load instead of the first article

title: News: Article time stamps and by lines
custom_preconds: Given you are on the news section
custom_steps: When you look at the news index
custom_expected:
Then the time stamp and summary should be accurate
And match the main section article when chosen
And each article should have a by line
